fields.name: Simplicity First
fields.value: Minimal setup with markdown-centered project structure helps you focus on writing.

fields.name: Vue-Powered
fields.value: Enjoy the dev experience of Vue + webpack, use Vue components in markdown, and develop custom themes with Vue.

fields.name: Performant
fields.value: VuePress generates pre-rendered static HTML for each page, and runs as an SPA once a page is loaded.
